events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible because this product is not what I wanted.
The system identified the issue as a refund request due to an incorrect product being delivered to the customer.
Assigning the case to our refund specialist team for further assistance and resolution.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I’m here to help you with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify and process the refund quickly?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. I’ve attached a photo of the item which clearly shows it is not what I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate your refund immediately, and you should see the amount credited to your original payment method within 5-7 business days.
Thanks for the quick help! I appreciate the prompt response and the hassle-free refund process.
The refund process is now completed on our side. Please contact us if you do not see the refund in your account within the specified timeframe.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund successfully and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
We are closing this case now. Thank you for contacting support, and we hope to serve you better in the future.
Please take a moment to complete a short survey about your recent support experience to help us improve our service.
